body.p: I have been in town a day or two, & in doubt where to direct to you, till Ashton, whom I saw today, told me you were at Richmond. I have seen him & his Lordling, and am mightily pleased with 'em both; the boy kisses his eyes out, & had no sooner heard, that I was Mr John Ashton, but he climbed up to the top of my head, & came down again on the other side in half a second. I shall be glad to know when & where I may see you most alone, &
